thread.title: Phoenix Group Launches 30MW Hydropower Mining Operation in Ethiopia; H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy Rating and AED 3.00 Price Target
thread.title_full: Phoenix Group Launches 30MW Hydropower Mining Operation in Ethiopia; H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy Rating and AED 3.00 Price Target

author: Business Wire
title: Phoenix Group Launches 30MW Hydropower Mining Operation in Ethiopia; H.C. Wainwright Reaffirms Buy Rating and AED 3.00 Price Target
text:
ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov 6, 2025--
Phoenix Group PLC (ADX: PHX), an IHC portfolio company and a global leader in digital asset infrastructure, in partnership with Ethiopian Electric Power, Ethiopia’s state-owned electric power producer, today announced the 30MW hydropower-backed mining facility at Bole Lemi Industrial Park in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
